units.title: Organoid generation in 96-well plates
units.text: were aggregated into embryoid bodies and cultured in minimal neural induction media (MNIM) to induce neuroectodermal fates (Fig. 1a).
units.rationale: Describes the initial step of forming organoids from pluripotent stem cells.

units.title: Control condition without morphogen
units.text: In each batch, one condition did not receive any morphogen but was exposed to the same base media and served as control.
units.rationale: Specifies the negative control needed for comparative analysis.

units.title: Morphogen delivery formats
units.text: We apply concentration gradients in microfluidic chips or increasing static concentrations in multi-well plates and observe different patterning dynamics in each scenario.
units.rationale: Outlines two distinct methods for exposing organoids to morphogen gradients.

units.title: Single‑cell preparation and hashing
units.text: were pooled and dissociated into single-cell suspensions, followed by cell hashing with barcoded antibodies and processing for single-cell transcriptome sequencing (3′ mRNA, 10x Genomics; Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: Details the workflow for generating multiplexed scRNA‑seq data.

units.title: Timed WNT inhibition treatment
units.text: Inhibition of the WNT pathway (XAV939) at early and intermediate time points (days 0–3, 10–13 and 14–17) led to a significant enrichment in telencephalic progenitors (Fig. 2a and Extended Data Fig. 3a).
units.rationale: Provides a concrete schedule for applying a specific morphogen.

units.title: In situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) validation
units.text: In situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) stainings confirmed the presence of more retinal progenitors (SFRP2+) at lower RA concentrations and more ventralized and posterior fates (FOXA2+) at higher RA concentrations (Fig. 2d).
units.rationale: Shows how marker expression was verified after treatment.

units.title: Morphogen combination screening
units.text: All conditions were multiplexed using cell hashing and sequenced in a single 10x Genomics run.
units.rationale: Describes the high‑throughput approach for testing morphogen pairs.

units.title: Neural induction media comparison
units.text: We note that these experiments are performed in MNIM without dual SMAD inhibition.
units.rationale: Indicates the use of two alternative induction strategies.

units.title: Harvest time point
units.text: On day 21, multiple neural organoids were harvested for analysis.
units.rationale: Specifies the endpoint for downstream assays.

units.title: Diversity assessment metric
units.text: We measured the heterogeneity of each patterning condition using the Shannon diversity index, where lower scores indicate lower cell-type diversity.
units.rationale: Provides the quantitative method for evaluating cell‑type composition.
